You can create an HighWaveCandle Candlestick Pattern indicator that requires manual update. The following reference table describes the HighWaveCandle constructor.

HighWaveCandle()1/2

            HighWaveCandle QuantConnect.Indicators.CandlestickPatterns.HighWaveCandle (
     string  name
   )

Initializes a new instance of the HighWaveCandle class using the specified name.

Parameters
string name The name of this indicator.

Return

HighWaveCandle - The new HighWaveCandle indicator object.

            HighWaveCandle QuantConnect.Indicators.CandlestickPatterns.HighWaveCandle (

This constructor does not take any argument.

HighWaveCandle - The new HighWaveCandle indicator object.

Definition at line 53 of file CandlestickPatterns/HighWaveCandle.cs.


You can update the indicator automatically or manually.

Automatic Update

Create a consolidator and then call the RegisterIndicator method to update the indicator with the consolidated bars.

using QuantConnect.Indicators.CandlestickPatterns;

private HighWaveCandle _highwavecandle;

// In Initialize()
_highwavecandle = new HighWaveCandle(name);
_highwavecandle.Updated += IndicatorUpdateMethod;

var thirtyMinuteConsolidator = new TradeBarConsolidator(TimeSpan.FromMinutes(30));
var symbol = AddEquity("SPY").Symbol;
SubscriptionManager.AddConsolidator(symbol, thirtyMinuteConsolidator);

RegisterIndicator(symbol, _highwavecandle, thirtyMinuteConsolidator);

// In IndicatorUpdateMethod()
if (_highwavecandle.IsReady)
{
    var indicatorValue = _highwavecandle.Current.Value;
}
from QuantConnect.Indicators.CandlestickPatterns import HighWaveCandle
    
# In Initialize()
self.highwavecandle = HighWaveCandle(name)
self.highwavecandle.Updated += self.IndicatorUpdateMethod

thirty_minute_consolidator = TradeBarConsolidator(timedelta(minutes=30))
symbol = self.AddEquity("SPY").Symbol
self.SubscriptionManager.AddConsolidator(symbol, thirty_minute_consolidator)

self.RegisterIndicator(symbol, self.highwavecandle, thirty_minute_consolidator)

# In IndicatorUpdateMethod()
if self.highwavecandle.IsReady:
    indicator_value = self.highwavecandle.Current.Value

Manual Update

Updating your indicator manually enables you to control when the indicator is updated and what data you use to update it. To manually update the indicator, call the Update method that with a TradeBar. The indicator will only be ready after you prime it with enough data.

using QuantConnect.Indicators.CandlestickPatterns;
    
private HighWaveCandle _highwavecandle;
private Symbol symbol;

// In Initialize()
_highwavecandle = new HighWaveCandle();
symbol = AddEquity("SPY").Symbol;

// In OnData()
if (data.Bars.ContainsKey(_symbol))
{
    _highwavecandle.Update(data.Bars[symbol]);
}
if (_highwavecandle.IsReady)
{
    var indicatorValue = _highwavecandle.Current.Value;
}
from QuantConnect.Indicators.CandlestickPatterns import HighWaveCandle
    
# In Initialize()
self.highwavecandle = HighWaveCandle()
self.symbol = self.AddEquity("SPY").Symbol

# In OnData()
if data.Bars.ContainsKey(self.symbol):
    self.highwavecandle.Update(data.Bars[self.symbol])
if self.highwavecandle.IsReady:
    indicator_value = self.highwavecandle.Current.Value
